short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Create and manage Google Drive files.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension helps you manage Google Drive files, create docs, spreadsheets, or forms. All actions are performed locally in your browser, ensuring no data is sent to third-party servers.

When you click the extension icon, it opens your Google Drive in a pop-up window. From there, you can rename, download, delete, and transfer files. The interface is similar to Google Drive, intuitive, and user-friendly, without unnecessary features.

For managing Google Drive , you can:
• Create new files
• Rename files
• Download or delete files
• Search for specific files
• Browse different Google Drive sections like a Shared With You or Starred.

Google Drive is a cloud service of Google Inc., registered in the U.S. and other countries. This is an independent project developed by the community and has no relationship to Google Drive or Google Inc. in any way.
